channel.title: Alphabet City on Gourmand Syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in Alphabet City on Gourmand Syndrome

item.title: Secchu Yokota
item.description: Tempura is one of those things in Japanese cuisine that is pretty expensive for what it is, but when you find the right batter with the right ingredients, it’s so good. In Torrance in California, it’s been over a decade since I tried specialized tempura, so I was craving it recently. Unfortunately my partner loathes tempura for some odd reason, so I opted to dine alone when they decided to watch a Broadway show.
